casebody.data:
AMERICAN RED CROSS, HEART OF AMERICA BLOOD SERVICES REGION, petitioner,
v.
Claude T. HARRELL, Jr., Regional Director of Subregion 33 of the National Labor Relations Board. No. 13-203. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 15, 2013.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.
